alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lewis, northern Wayne, central Marshall, northern Lawrence, southern Maury, northern Giles and southern Perry Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lewisburg to 9 miles southeast of Linden. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lewisburg, Lawrenceburg, Hohenwald, Waynesboro, Mount Pleasant, Summertown, Clifton, Cornersville, Ethridge, Lynnville, Gordonsburg, Henryville, Culleoka, Flatwoods and Belfast. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 24 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Giles; Lawrence; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Perry; Wayne
